context.p: To create a report from data in the data warehouse:

ul.li: start_date is the date you want data from. For example, 2012-11-05.
end_date is the date you want data to.
report_type is the type of report you want to run: instance, S3, volume, snapshot, IP, or capacity.
your_password is the administrator password you configured in the data warehouse installation.

taskbody.postreq: For more information about eucadw-generate-report, go to the Command Line Interface Reference Guide.
